TITLE: BIMS Calculator - By using this tool to manage your body weight
META: Get started on a healthier lifestyle today by finding your adjusted body weight with our adjusted weight calculator

calculatorRow.labelName: It would be best to conduct the interview in a quiet, private setting. Ensure you introduce the test to the resident and that the resident does not have a hearing problem. If the resident has a hearing impairment, offer alternative modes of communication, such as writing or cue cards
Part I – Repetition of three words

Inform the resident that you will say three words and that they need to remember the words and repeat them. Say the three words, e.g., sock, blue, and bed. Ask the resident to reproduce the three words and note the number after the first attempt:

calculatorRow.labelId: Feeling nervous, anxious or on edge__id
calculatorRow.inputId: Feeling nervous, anxious or on edge_input_Id

calculatorRow.labelName: A. Ask the resident what year it is right now and report their answer:

calculatorRow.labelId: Not being able to stop or control worrying__id
calculatorRow.inputId: Not being able to stop or control worrying_input_Id

calculatorRow.labelName: B. Ask the resident what month we are in at the moment and report their answer:

calculatorRow.labelId: Worrying too much about different things__id
calculatorRow.inputId: Worrying too much about different things_input_Id

calculatorRow.labelName: C. Ask the resident what day of the week it is today and report their response:

Tell the resident that you are going back to the earlier question and ask them to say the words that they were asked to repeat. If they are unable to remember a word, provide cues such as “something to wear”, ”a color”, “a piece of furniture.”

calculatorRow.labelId: Being so restless that it is hard to sit still__id
calculatorRow.inputId: Being so restless that it is hard to sit still_input_Id

calculatorRow.labelId: Feeling afraid as if something awful might happen__id
calculatorRow.inputId: Feeling afraid as if something awful might happen_input_Id
